details.arabic_diacless: أستودعكم اللٰه الذي لا تضيع ودائعه
details.arabic: أَسْتَوْدِعُكُمُ اللّٰهَ الَّذِيْ لَا تَضِيْعُ وَدَائِعُهُ
details.translations: I leave you in the care of Allah, as nothing is lost that is in His care.
details.reference: Ahmad 2/403, Ibn Majah 2/943. See also Al-Albani, Sahih Ibn Majah 2/133.

pageTitle: Dua of the traveller for the resident
